description: China has launched the Long March-12 rocket from its new $553 million Wenchang Commercial Space Launch Site on Hainan Island. The rocket, capable of carrying 10 tons to low-Earth orbit, delivered two experimental satellites on November 30, 2024. Designed with advanced fuel systems and lighter materials, the rocket enhances payload capacity. The spaceport's coastal location reduces transport and fuel costs while supporting reusable rocket recovery.
title: China Unveils $553M Spaceport with Successful Long March-12 Rocket Launch

description: SpaceX has completed the first Starlink constellation for direct-to-cell connectivity, aiming to deliver mobile internet to remote areas without specialised equipment. This development follows the launch of 20 satellites from Vandenberg Space Force Base, with 13 featuring direct-to-cell technology. The satellites integrate with the existing network to eliminate dead zones, marking significant progress in global broadband expansion. Over 7,000 satellites have been launched as part of the ambitious Starlink project to improve global internet access.
title: SpaceX Completes Starlink Direct-to-Cell Constellation with New Satellite Launch

description: The Vega-C rocket has successfully resumed operations, launching the Copernicus Sentinel-1C Earth-observation satellite. After a failure in 2022, Vega-C’s design was updated, allowing it to complete this mission. Sentinel-1C will work alongside Sentinel-1A to enhance Earth’s monitoring capabilities. The launch took place from the Guiana Space Centre in French Guiana, marking a significant milestone in Europe’s space program.
title: Vega-C Rocket Successfully Returns to Flight with Sentinel-1C Launch After 2022 Failure

description: A new study has warned that up to a third of Earth's species could face extinction by 2100 due to rising global temperatures. The research, published in Science, highlights how climate change is accelerating extinction risks, especially for amphibians and species in isolated ecosystems. With emissions continuing at current rates, the risk of extinction rises sharply, particularly in regions like South America, Australia, and New Zealand. Immediate action on greenhouse gas emissions is crucial to halt this alarming trend.
title: One-Third of Earth's Species Could Face Extinction by 2100 Due to Climate Change

description: Meta AI is transforming WhatsApp chats with advanced AI-powered responses, image generation, and creative tools. Learn how to use it in both individual and group chats with this step-by-step guide. From accessing the Meta AI chatbot to utilising its features like text-based creative assistance and factual queries, this guide has everything you need to know to enhance your WhatsApp experience. Currently rolling out gradually, Meta AI is set to revolutionise digital communication by making it more interactive, private, and efficient.
title: How to Use Meta AI in WhatsApp Individual and Group Chats?

description: After a long break, Oppo is back with not one but two Find X series devices. Oppo launched its Find X8, its base Find X series model; and its Find X8 Pro that goes all out in terms of camera features and price. In our review, we discovered that Oppo’s Find X8 offers incredible value given its rich feature set and compact form factor. But its Find X8 Pro comes up a few stops short.
title: Oppo Find X8 and Find X8 Pro Review: Back in the Game?

description: Jigra, starring Alia Bhatt, will be available for streaming on Netflix starting December 6, 2024. Directed by Vasan Bala, the film is set to reach a wider global audience through its OTT release. With a gripping narrative that explores themes of sacrifice and family bonds, Jigra offers a compelling viewing experience. The film, which features a talented cast including Vedang Raina, Manoj Pahwa, and Vivek Gomber, will now be accessible for viewers to enjoy from the comfort of their homes. Netflix’s release of Jigra provides a fresh opportunity for audiences to connect with the film, offering a new chapter for its reception. Don't miss it when it premieres on Netflix.
title: Jigra OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Alia Bhatt Starrer Movie Online?

description: The Kannada horror-comedy Matinee, directed by Manohar Kaampalli, will stream on Sun NXT starting December 6, 2024. Released in theatres on April 5, the film stars Sathish Ninasam and Rachita Ram. The story revolves around a group of friends who trick their way into selling a haunted property but encounter real supernatural events. While the film faced criticism for its predictable plot, it brings humour and a spooky twist for OTT audiences.
title: Matinee OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Kannada Horror-Comedy Movie Online

description: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) successfully launched the PSLV-C59 rocket on December 5, 2024, from Sriharikota, deploying the European Space Agency’s (ESA) Proba-3 satellites into orbit. Proba-3, a twin-satellite mission, aims to demonstrate precision formation flying, achieving control down to a millimeter. The spacecraft will create artificial solar eclipses in orbit, allowing extended observation of the Sun's corona.
title: ISRO Successfully Launches PSLV-C59 Carrying ESA’s Proba-3 Satellites

description: Experts warn that the sun's next phase, the "battle zone," could result in increased geomagnetic activity, lasting until 2028. This period could bring heightened solar flares and coronal holes, which may cause disruptions to satellites in low-Earth orbit. Space weather experts, including Scott McIntosh from Lynker Space, have noted that this phase could pose significant challenges for satellite operators, as increased atmospheric drag could impact their stability and functioning. While auroras may become more vivid, technological systems face greater vulnerability.
title: Solar 'Battle Zone' Could be Even Worse Than Solar Maximum, Experts Warn

description: Google Chrome runs twice as fast on Android smartphones than it did in April 2023, according to the company. According to Google, Chrome will now run even faster, especially on Android devices, after it recently doubled its score on the popular Speedometer benchmark test. Here's how Google optimised Chrome to run faster on Android phones.
title: Google Chrome Doubles Speedometer Benchmark Scores on Android Devices

description: Google introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature in Live Captions on Thursday. Dubbed Expressive Captions, the feature is being rolled out to the Android operating system. With this, users will be able to see live captions of videos played across the device in a new format to better convey the context behind the sounds. The AI feature will convey excitement, shouting, and loudness with text showing in all caps.
title: Google Live Captions Upgraded With AI-Powered Expressive Captions on Android

description: A recent discovery of 15 Neolithic skulls in the Masseria Candelaro site in Italy offers new insights into ancient rituals. The skulls, dating back to 5618-5335 B.C., suggest they were part of a unique ancestor practice. Found inside a structure, the skulls show no signs of violence, hinting that they were handled over generations in symbolic rituals rather than being used for trophies. The discovery sheds light on complex mortuary customs of early societies.
title: 15 Stone Age Skulls Found in Italy’s Neolithic Village, Unveiling Ancient Rituals

description: OnePlus Ace 5 Mini might debut in China soon, although the company has yet to officially confirm its launch or name. A tipster has shared key details about the rumored handset, including its display, chipset, camera, and security features. Additionally, a design element of the device has been hinted at.
title: OnePlus Ace 5 Mini With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 50-Megapixel Main Camera Surfaces Online

description: In a study by the Alfred Wegener Institute, scientists identified a sharp drop in planetary albedo as a primary factor in the 2023 temperature rise. This decline, particularly in low-altitude clouds, has been linked to a 0.23°C increase in global mean temperature. The study highlights that global warming itself may be reducing cloud cover, suggesting further temperature increases are imminent. Researchers urge action on carbon budgets and adaptation measures.
title: Researchers Points out Rapid Surge in Global Temperature Could be Due to Reduced Planetary Albedo

description: In response to rising input costs and operational expenses, Maruti Suzuki India Limited announced a price increase across its car models effective January 2025. The hike, which is expected to be up to four percent, will vary depending on the model, according to a company statement released today.
title: Maruti Suzuki to Hike Car Prices in India by Up to 4 Percent Starting January 2025

description: Uber Technologies has begun offering its first autonomous rides outside the US in Abu Dhabi, making good on an earlier partnership struck with Chinese vehicle partner WeRide.
title: Uber Launches First Robotaxi Service Outside of US in Abu Dhabi

description: OnePlus Watch 3 may soon be introduced as a successor to the OnePlus Watch 2, which was initially unveiled at MWC 2024 in February. A report suggests that the watch appeared on a certification site. The listing hints at the probable dimension details, battery size and connectivity options of the smartwatch.
title: OnePlus Watch 3 Reportedly Spotted on US FCC Website; Likely to Get Bigger Battery

description: Google has silently announced that it is extending the support for Pixel Fold, Pixel 6 series and select other models in its lineup. The aforementioned smartphones will now support a total of five years of operating system (OS) and security updates starting from when they first became available on the Google Store in the US — an increase over the previous three-year limit.
title: Google Confirms Pixel Fold, Pixel 6 and Select Other Models Will Get 5 Years of OS Updates

description: Microsoft introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) capability for Copilot on Thursday. Dubbed Copilot Vision, it now enables the AI chatbot to see and understand the context of what a user does online. The Redmond-based tech giant said that Copilot can access the Microsoft Edge browser. The vision-enabled chatbot can now monitor which websites and web pages the user browses, and then can perform certain commands when prompted.
title: Microsoft Rolling Out Copilot Vision in Preview, Can Understand User’s Browsing Activity

description: Researchers at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) have developed a bird-like robot named RAVEN (Robotic Avian-inspired Vehicle for multiple ENvironments), designed to launch into flight using spring-loaded legs. This innovative design was inspired by the flight mechanics of crows, which use their legs to spring into the air, allowing them to conserve energy compared to relying solely on wings. RAVEN features a fixed-wing design, a split-V tail, and a front-mounted engine to power a single propeller. During tests, the robot demonstrated its ability to walk, hop, and leap into the air while transitioning to flight. This versatile design is seen as a step forward in creating drones with multimodal locomotion for various real-world applications.
title: Bird-Inspired RAVEN Robot Has Specialised Legs to Help it Jump Into Flight

description: Google introduced the successor to its PaliGemma artificial intelligence (AI) vision-language model on Thursday. Dubbed PaliGemma 2, the family of AI models improve upon the capabilities of the older generation. The Mountain View-based tech giant said the vision-language model can see, understand, and interact with visual input such as images and other visual assets. It is built using the Gemma 2 small language models (SLM) which were released in August.
title: Google Introduces PaliGemma 2 Family of Open Source AI Vision-Language Models

description: OnePlus could launch a new tablet soon. A tipster has suggested some key features of the rumoured tablet including display, chipset, camera, battery and charging details. These suggest that the purported OnePlus Pad could be a rebranded version of the Oppo Pad 3, which was unveiled in China in November alongside the Oppo Reno 13 series.
title: OnePlus Tablet With11.6-Inch Screen, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC Surfaces Online

description: iOS 18.2 Release Candidate (RC) was rolled out by Apple to registered developers and public testers in beta on Thursday. RC updates are the final versions of beta software before it is released to the public. Hence, they do not include any new features but improve upon the existing ones introduced in previous updates. iOS 18.2 RC brings fixes for bugs related to accessibility, ChatGPT integration, Find My, Genmoji, Swift UI, and writing tools.
title: iOS 18.2 Release Candidate With Bug Fixes and System Improvements Released

description: Hackers are using a phishing scam to target Netflix account users, telling them that their account has been suspended, in order to prompt them to visit a maliciously crafted website. This website steals their Netflix password and banking information, which is then sold on the dark web. Here's how you can keep your Netflix login and password, as well as your banking information safe.
title: Netflix Suspended Account Scam Being Used By Hackers to Steal User Information in Several Countries
The Future in Your Pocket: 6 Ways the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6 Changes Everything

description: Google has rolled out the December Pixel Feature Drop update for compatible Pixel devices. Apart from including the latest security patch, the update introduces new ways of using Gemini, which include getting more personalised responses, accessing more apps and services, and taking advantage of smarter replies when using Call Screen. The update also brings upgrades to the Pixel Screenshots app, Pixel Studio, Gboard, and other system improvements.
title: Google's December Pixel Feature Drop Rolls Out With Improvements to Gemini and More

description: A mix of exciting OTT releases awaits this week. Titles like Jigra and Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video will be streaming on Netflix. With gripping storylines ranging from action thrillers to mystery dramas, platforms such as Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ Hotstar are also adding fresh content to their catalogues. Perfect for a weekend binge, check out all the latest movies and series streaming this week.
title: OTT Releases This Week: Jigra, Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video, Amaran, and More

description: OnePlus Green Line Worry-Free Solution has been launched in India, as part of the company's efforts to address the "green line" screen issues reported by its customers. New improvements to the company's AMOLED displays including a new new PVX layer wer also announced, while OnePlus says it has expanded its lifetime warranty against the green line issue to include all of its smartphone models.
title: OnePlus Green Line Worry-Free Solution With Lifetime Screen Warranty Launched in India

description: On the sidelines of India Blockchain Week (IBW 2024), Ryan Sungho Kim shared insights with Gadgets 360 on how investment firms are navigating the evolving Web3 regulatory landscape. He emphasised that industry insiders still have significant opportunities to engage with authorities and contribute to shaping Web3 regulations in regions where policies are under discussion.
title: Markets with Evolving Web3 Regulations Offer Exciting Opportunities: Ryan Sungho Kim at IBW 2024

description: Redmi has confirmed that it will launch the Redmi Note 14 series on December 9, 2024. The new series will include three models: Redmi Note 14 Pro+, Redmi Note 14 Pro, and Redmi Note 14. The upcoming series is expected to come with a starting price of Rs. 21,999. The Redmi Note 14 series will offer some notable improvements as compared to its predecessors.
title: Redmi Note 14 Series Roundup: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Features, Specifications, and More

description: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope has captured unprecedented views of quasar 3C 273, located 2.5 billion light-years away. Using the STIS coronagraph, researchers uncovered unusual structures around the black hole, including an extragalactic jet and a mysterious L-shaped filament. The findings hint at galaxy interactions fuelling the quasar’s activity, offering critical insights into the evolution of quasars and their host galaxies.
title: Hubble Offers Closest Look at Quasar 3C 273, Reveal Hidden Structures

description: It’s been a year since the first trailer for Grand Theft Auto 6 broke the Internet. After years of speculation, leaks and rumours, Rockstar Games posted the GTA 6 reveal trailer on YouTube on December 5, 2023. Titled “Grand Theft Auto VI Trailer 1”, the video has since gone on to be viewed over 224 million times on the platform. A year later, as anticipation for the game has only grown, fans have been left disappointed by the lack of credible updates on GTA 6.
title: No GTA 6 Trailer a Year After Reveal as Fans Wait for Official Update From Rockstar Games

description: Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 5G and Phantom V Flip 2 5G were launched in India on Friday. The book-style Phantom V Fold 2 carries a 7.85-inch main screen and a 6.42-inch cover display. Meanwhile, the Phantom V Flip 2 clamshell foldable has a 6.9-inch inner display and a 3.64-inch outer screen. The handsets will go on sale in the country later this month.
title: Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 5G, Phantom V Flip 2 5G Foldable Smartphones Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: The comedy-drama Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video, starring Rajkummar Rao and Triptii Dimri, will stream on Netflix starting December 7. Directed by Raaj Shaandilyaa, the film follows a newlywed couple whose lives are disrupted when a personal videotape goes missing. After its theatrical release on October 11, 2024, the movie received mixed reviews.
title: Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Rajkummar Rao, Triptii Dimri Starrer Movie

description: The Tamil film Brother, starring Jayam Ravi, has become a streaming success on ZEE5, crossing 100 million minutes viewed. Directed by Rajesh M, the movie blends comedy and drama, following a mischievous brother's antics in his sister's household. Featuring an ensemble cast, including Priyanka Arul Mohan and Bhumika Chawla, it appeals to viewers seeking light-hearted family entertainment. Released on October 31 during Diwali, the film’s OTT performance highlights its widespread popularity.
title: Jayam Ravi’s Brother Surpasses 100 Million Streaming Minutes on ZEE5

description: Motorola Razr 50 Ultra and Edge 50 Neo are now available in a new colour option. The company has announced that the two handsets will be available in Mocha Mousse, the Pantone Colour of the Year 2025. The new variants will have similar specifications and features as the existing options.
title: Motorola Razr 50 Ultra, Edge 50 Neo Introduced in New Mocha Mousse Colour Option

description: OpenAI brought the o1 artificial intelligence (AI) model out of preview on Thursday and released the full version. The AI firm claims that the new model can now perform tasks that the o1-preview could not. It is also said to be faster in response times and more concise in its thinking. The OpenAI o1 AI model will be available to all the paid subscribers of ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Launches Full Version of Reasoning-Focused o1 AI Model, Introduces ChatGPT Pro Subscription

description: Instagram announced new features for broadcast channels on Wednesday. The latest update adds more ways for creators to engage with their audience instead of simply liking and reacting to messages — the only avenue for interaction on the social media platform until now. Instagram users can now reply to messages from creators as well as each other. Further, it now enables creators to actively engage courtesy of timed prompts and daily check-ins.
title: Instagram Adds Replies, Insights and More Features to Broadcast Channels for Improved Audience Engagement

description: Honor was recently granted a patent for a new display technology that could allow the brand to launch future smartphones or tablets with a screen that can "extend" to offer an enlarged display area when needed. Here's everything you need to know about  Honor's new display technology.
title: Honor Working on Extendable Mobile Display Technology, Patent Shows

description: The upcoming season of Foamstars, Square Enix’s 4v4 online party shooter, will be its last, the publisher announced Thursday. The Splatoon-inspired action game will be updated with a new season of content on December 13.
title: Foamstars' Next Season Update Will Be Its Last, but Game Will Stay Online, Says Square Enix

description: Samsung announced the One UI 7 beta rollout in select regions a month after its initial unveiling at the Samsung Developer Conference (SDC) 2024 in San Jose, California. The update brings Android 15 to Galaxy devices, introducing visual enhancements with more customisation options, a new notification system called Now Bar, redesigned One UI widgets, improved user interface (UI) for the camera app, and additions to Galaxy AI.
title: Samsung One UI 7 Beta With Galaxy AI Features Rolls Out: Availability, Eligible Models and Features

description: WhatsApp has rolled out a new feature for mobile devices which makes it easier for users to engage in chats in real time, it announced on Thursday. It will now display typing indicators with visual cues appearing in chats when users are engaged in active conversations in both one-to-one and group chats.
title: WhatsApp Introduces New Typing Indicators for Real-Time Engagement in Chats

description: Redmi Note 14 5G will launch in India alongside the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ and Redmi Note 14 Pro on December 9. The lineup was unveiled in China in September with up to IP68 rating for dust and water resistance. Ahead of the India launch, the Amazon availability of the base Redmi Note 14 5G has been confirmed alongside key features and colour options.
title: Redmi Note 14 5G to Be Available on Amazon; Colour Options, Key Features Revealed Ahead of India Launch
